content:
Dianna Quay's runs a hair salon inFlorida, USA. Details of the firm's latest budget are shown below:
Column 1 (Variable) has: Wages, Salaries, Stock, Revenue, Direct costs;
Column 2 (Budgeted$) has: 4000, 4500, 1800, 15750, x
Column 3 (Actual$) has: 4200, 4500, 1850, x, 2950
Column 4 (Variance$) has: x, x, x, 290, 250
Column 5 (Variance F/A) has: x, x, x, Favourable, Favourable 
Find the value of all the "x" in the table above for Quay's Hair Salon Inc.
